mayavi_counter :int = 0¶
create_movie(self, dir_path: pathlib.Path = None, input_data_file_pattern: str = '*.png', delete_input: bool = True) → pathlib.Path[source]¶

Creates movie filename with all matching pictures from input_data_file_pattern. By default deletes all input pictures after creation of movie to save disk space.

Parameters

  • dir_path – Path where to look for old directories (movie data)

  • input_data_file_pattern – Regex pattern to find all input data

  • delete_input – Condition if the input pictures should be deleted, after creation the creation of the animation as e.g. mp4

prepare(self, System: supersolids.Schroedinger.Schroedinger)[source]¶
animate_npz(self, dir_path: pathlib.Path = None, filename_schroedinger=f'schroedinger.pkl', filename_steps=f'step_', steps_format: str = '%06d', steps_per_npz: int = 10, frame_start: int = 0)[source]¶
animate(self, System: supersolids.Schroedinger.Schroedinger, accuracy: float = 10 ** - 6, interactive: bool = True)[source]¶

Animates solving of the Schroedinger equations of System with mayavi in 3D. Animation is limited to System.max_timesteps or the convergence according to accuracy.

Parameters

  • System – Schrödinger equations for the specified system

  • accuracy – Convergence is reached when relative error of mu is smaller than accuracy, where \(\mu = - \log(\psi_{normed}) / (2 dt)\)

  • slice_indices – Numpy array with indices of grid points in the directions x, y, z (in terms of System.x, System.y, System.z) to produce a slice/plane in mayavi, where \(\psi_{prob}\) = \(|\psi|^2\) is used for the slice Max values is for e.g. System.Res.x - 1.

  • interactive – Condition for interactive mode. When camera functions are used, then interaction is not possible. So interactive=True turn the usage of camera functions off.
